duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive and process patient meal orders, ensuring appropriate diet prescription and entering them into the computerized system.
Answer phones and assist patients with menu selections, maintaining patient confidentiality.
Process reports and inspections, communicate patient needs to the team, and work closely with team members in the Food and Nutrition Department.
Work under minimal supervision in a fast-paced environment, following departmental guidelines and procedures.
Maintain flexibility of hours, reading, following instructions, and completing mandatory education and in-service requirements.

education_certification.credential: High School graduate or equivalent. Nutrition education preferred.
